title: Global leading fishing nations 2017
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Capture in million metric tons in the y axis.
The Capture in million metric tons is appeared to be the highest at Country China and lowest at Country Myanmar.
There is a difference of 13.22 between the maximum Country China and minimum Country Myanmar.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Capture in million metric tons in the y axis.
The maximum Capture in million metric tons 15.37 is found at Country China and the minimum is found at Myanmar where Country is 2.15.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Capture in million metric tons in the y axis.
The Capture in million metric tons is appeared to be the highest at Country China and lowest at Country Myanmar.
There is a difference of 13.22 between the maximum Country China and minimum Country Myanmar.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Capture in million metric tons in the y axis.
Country China has the highest Capture in million metric tons and Myanmar has the lowest Capture in million metric tons.
The difference of Capture in million metric tons between the highest and lowest Country is 13.22.
Capture in million metric tons at Country China is 15.37 , second place is Indonesia at 6.69, and thirdly is India at 5.43.
The Country China has 2.92 times more Capture in million metric tons than average.
